price: 1. Waxaa Aadmiga soo maray waqti wax la sheego uusan aheyn (uusan jirinba).
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا
footnotes: 1. Al-Insaan: dadka, waxaa sidoo kale Suuraddan la yidhaahdaa Ad-Dahar (Waqtiga).

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: hal atā ʿalā al-insāni ḥīnun mina al-dahri lam yakun shayan madhkūran
